name: TAA Exclusive 49
additionalNotes:
Add Kristoff Cigars to the list of the exclusive cigars for the 2017 Tobacconists Association of America (TAA) Exclusive Series. This month, retailers have begun to receive the Kristoff TAA Exclusive 49 – a large 7 1/2 x 56 salomon release.

This is the first Kristoff cigar branded with the TAA name on it, however this is not Kristoff’s first go-around with the TAA. In 2013, the Kristoff 685 Woodlawn was offered first to members of the TAA before being sold widely.  Two years later, Kristoff took the same approach with the Kristoff Classic Reserva as it was offered to TAA members first.

The cigar features a Honduran Criollo wrapper, Dominican binder, and Dominican and Nicaraguan tobacco in the filler. The 7 1/2 x 56 salomons are packaged ten per box.

The “49” stands for the fact that 2017 is the 49th anniversary of the TAA as an organization. Like the majority of the 2017 TAA Exclusive Series, this cigar was released with very little marketing push behind it.
The Kristoff TAA Exclusive 49 is available in one size – a 7 1/2 x 56 Salomon.
